title: Do anyone facing problem with Type c port of pixel 2xl android 11???
content:
When connecting any Type C pendrive or otg or even charging cable it is going on boot loop and no data transfer can be done. Even connect to charger it goes shutdown quickly then need to turn it on in this case after turn on charging going okay but when connect and disconnect it goes shutdown.

I already changed so many charger, otg and pendrive same issue facing also already clean port no any derbies in it.

Can anyone suggest what is the issue is it software or hardware issue?
